thread.title: RIVERSIDE: Farmer Boys brings back Xtreme Bacon Boy
thread.title_full: RIVERSIDE: Farmer Boys brings back Xtreme Bacon Boy - Press Enterprise

author: FIELDING BUCK
title: RIVERSIDE: Farmer Boys brings back Xtreme Bacon Boy
text:
BY FIELDING BUCK / STAFF WRITER
Published: Oct. 12, 2015 Updated: 3:08 p.m. RIVERSIDE: Farmer Boys brings back Xtreme Bacon Boy Print Photo Share Pin It More Galleries ADVERTISEMENT Related article Â» Farmer Boys has a promotion going on top of a promotion.
The Inland chain has brought back Xtreme Bacon Boy, a half-pound burger with two beef patties sitting on a bed of bacon bits and topped with American cheese and two slices of bacon.
In addition, guests who buy any burger combo at Farmer Boys will get a free sample of a new dessert called CinnaTreats, beignet-style pastries sprinkled with cinnamon and sugar.
TV commercials featuring both items will air in Southern California and Las Vegas, according to a news release.
Farmer Boys is based in Riverside and had 84 restaurants in California and Nevada.
